nodes.bodyText: I didn't even know Throwable exists

It is generally not recommended to catch and/or attempt to handle Throwable as it is the union of Exception (you might be able to recover...) and Error (you are probably dead and need to let it bubble out and crash quickly). It may not even be the right thing to do in this case, it's hard to say - as in it might just result in crashes one line away. But the risk seems low and since we're already sort of in an error-handling case, maybe useful.
